Improvements.Description: The testing of the compact sketch, `testSk`, after wrapping `directMem` is done twice with the same conditions which is redundant. The second testing can be removed

Improvements.Improvement: Use try-with-resources for automatic resource management
Improvements.Description: The `WritableHandle` resource needs to be closed after use to free up system resources. Since Java 7, you can use the try-with-resources statement for automatic resource management. This ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement.
